summary: A collection of craftsman tools as modders resources for static and misc item usage
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=============================
Stroti's Craftsman Tools Resource for Skyrim

Version 1.0
=============================

by Stroti

Converted by Tamira

=============================

Modder's resource
=============================

Adds:

4 different hammers
3 different mallets
3 different saws
3 different tongs
3 different chisels
2 different planes
Axe
Circle
Driller
Nails
Wooden Angle
Horseshoe
Toolbox

2 workbenches, one for the use as a static and the other for the use as crafting workbench (edit the original crafting workbench and replace the model with this model)

For the meshes there are 2 folders:
The objects in the folder Craftsman Tools Static have static collision and should be added as statics in the Creation Kit.
The objects in the folder Craftsman Tools Clutter have clutter (havoked) collision and should be added as misc items in the Creation Kit.

These conversions are a package of several of Stroti's resources, originally published for Oblivion. You can find the original resources here:
Strotis blacksmith tools http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/37728//?
Strotis woodworker tools http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/41097//?
Strotis static meshes workbench http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/37747//?

=================
Tools used:
=================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
Gimp
Blender

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modder's resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites.

Stroti has quit modding and will no longer be active on the forums.
I have his personal permission to convert his Oblivion resources and to upload them.

=================
Credits:
=================

Stroti for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
Bethesda for the TES games
author: Stroti and Tamira
